TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定 必須將特定類別成員序列化為 XML 項目的陣列。

span.span: Specifies that the must serialize a particular class member as an array of XML elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化物件。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 相似的屬性完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以套用到公用的欄位或讀取/寫入屬性，傳回物件的陣列。You can apply the to a public field or read/write property that returns an array of objects. 您可以也將它套用到集合和傳回的欄位會傳回該物件會實作任何欄位或介面。You can also apply it to collections and fields that return an or any field that returns an object that implements the interface. 當您套用類別的成員，方法類別會從該成員產生的 XML 項目巢狀的序列。When you apply the to a class member, the method of the class generates a nested sequence of XML elements from that member. XML 結構描述文件 （.xsd 檔案），表示這類陣列做為`complexType`。An XML schema document (an .xsd file), indicates such an array as a `complexType`. 比方說，如果要序列化的類別代表訂單，您可以產生各種購買的項目套用至公用欄位，會傳回代表訂單項目物件的陣列。For example, if the class to be serialized represents a purchase order, you can generate an array of purchased items by applying the to a public field that returns an array of objects that represent order items. 如果沒有屬性會套用至公用欄位或屬性，可傳回複雜或基本類型物件的陣列預設產生的 XML 項目巢狀的序列。If no attributes are applied to a public field or property that returns an array of complex or primitive type objects, the generates a nested sequence of XML elements by default. 若要更精確地控制所產生的 XML 項目，套用和欄位或屬性。To more precisely control what XML elements are generated, apply an and an to the field or property. 範例中，根據預設，產生的 XML 項目的名稱是衍生自成員識別碼可以設定變更產生的 XML 項目的名稱屬性。For example, by default, the name of the generated XML element is derived from the member identifier You can change the name of the generated XML element by setting the property. 如果您序列化陣列，其中包含特定類型的項目，而且所有的類別衍生自該型別，您必須使用宣告每個類型。If you serialize an array that contains items of a specific type and all the classes derived from that type, you must use the to declare each of the types. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用`XmlArray`代替較長的程式碼中。You can use `XmlArray` in your code instead of the longer . 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會序列化成 XML 文件，其中包含數個物件陣列的類別執行個體。The following example serializes a class instance into an XML document that contains several object arrays. 套用至的成員，成為 XML 項目陣列。The is applied to the members that become XML element arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將指派至兩個陣列。The following example assigns the to two arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 產生的 XML 項目名稱。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定 XML 文件執行個體中產生的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the XML element name generated in the XML document instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將指派至兩個陣列，並將資料序列化的類別執行個體，其中包含這些陣列。The following example assigns the to two arrays, and serializes a class instance that contains those arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] [!code-xml[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/Common/MyClass1.xml#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定指定給序列化陣列的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element name given to the serialized array.

value.span: 序列化陣列的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: The XML element name of the serialized array.

value.span: 預設值為被指派了 的成員名稱。

span.span: The default is the name of the member to which the is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要產生的 XML 項目名稱，不同於成員的識別碼。Specify an when you want the generated XML element name to differ from the member's identifier. 您可以設定為相同值到一個以上的成員，只要產生的 XML 文件會使用 XML 命名空間來區別同名的成員。You can set the same value to more than one member as long as the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members. 如需進一步瞭解使用命名空間和 XML 文件中建立有前置詞的名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more details about using namespaces and creating prefixed names in the XML document, see . ## Examples 下列範例會將序列化的執行個體`Library`類別，其中包含名為的屬性`Books`所傳回的陣列`Book`項目。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains a property named `Books` that returns an array of `Book` items. 此範例會使用屬性來指定 XML 項目的陣列應該命名為`My_Books`而非`Books`。The example uses the property to specify that the array of XML elements should be named `My_Books` rather than `Books`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm Form { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 產生的 XML 項目名稱是限定的還是非限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML element name generated by the is qualified or unqualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否限定或未限定 XML 元素名稱。The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified or unqualified. 屬性符合 1999年全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件標題為 <"Namespaces in XML。The property conforms to the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document titled "Namespaces in XML." 如果屬性設定為任何值時，嘗試設定屬性設`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`會擲回例外狀況。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 預設設定， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，會指示檢查 XML 文件，以判斷是否為限定的命名空間的結構描述。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果結構描述未指定個別的項目或屬性的值會使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`來判斷是否為限定的項目或屬性的值。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 下列 XML 程式碼會顯示結構描述：The following XML code shows a schema: ``` ``` 時讀取結構描述中，值都`Name`並`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`元素為限定，而`Number`項目是不合格。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下列範例會將序列化的執行個體`Enterprises`類別。The following example serializes an instance of the `Enterprises` class. 兩個 XML 項目具有相同的本機名稱 (`Company`) 但不同的前置詞。Two XML elements have the same local name (`Company`) but different prefixes. 範例會設定屬性設定為`XmlForm.Qualified`來確保限定的名稱不會發生在 XML 執行個體。The example sets the property is set to `XmlForm.Qualified` to ensure that the qualified names occur in the XML instance. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsNullable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否必須將成員序列化為 屬性設為 的空 XML 標記。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 產生 屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構的 XML 結構描述規格允許明確指示項目的內容遺漏 XML 文件。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 這類項目包含屬性`xsi:nil`設定為`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 規格標題為 「 XML 結構描述第 1 部分：結構。 」For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification titled "XML Schema Part 1: Structures." 如果屬性設定為`true`，則`xsi:nil`屬性就會產生已設成的類別成員的`null`。If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果您設定一個名為欄位`MyStringArray`要`null`，則會產生下列 XML 程式碼。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果屬性是`false`，就會產生任何 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 您不能套用成員的屬性型別為實值型別，因為實值型別不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下列範例包含兩個陣列： 一個屬性設定為`true`，和另一個具有屬性設定為`false`。The following example contains two arrays: one with the property set to `true`, and another with the property set to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目的命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML element.
The namespace of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您建立完整的 XML 項目名稱。The property allows you to create qualified XML element names. 屬性符合建立標題為 < Namespaces in XML 」。 「 1999年全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件中找到的 XML 命名空間的規則The property conforms to the rules for creating an XML namespace as found in the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document titled "Namespaces in XML." 若要建立具有前置詞相關聯的命名空間，您必須建立的執行個體類別，其中包含的命名空間和 XML 文件中使用的前置詞。To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 當您針對每個設定的命名空間，它必須符合其中一個命名空間中。As you set the namespace for each , it must match one of the namespaces in the . 當產生 XML 時，每個陣列正確前面會加上指定的命名空間相關聯的前置詞。When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace. ## Examples 下列範例會將序列化的執行個體`Library`包含兩個成員的類別，其中一個包含書籍標題，另一個則含有期刊標題。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains two members, one that contain book titles, and another that contain periodical titles. 雖然這兩個 XML 元素名稱`Titles`，每個包含不同的前置詞。Although both XML elements are named `Titles`, each contains a different prefix. 此範例也會包含執行個體類別，其中包含用來限定兩個項目名稱的前置詞與命名空間。The example also includes an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used to qualify the two element names. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定項目序列化或還原序列化的明確順序。

span.span: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
The order of the code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用列舉來指示產生程式碼，設定屬性。Use the enumeration to instruct the to generate code that sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一次屬性已使用在上一個公用屬性或型別中的欄位，它必須套用到所有公用屬性和欄位，該型別和所有繼承的類型。Once the property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.
